title: What feature do you think will be stripped next to increase revenue?
body:
So with the impending removal of the only other gamemode league of legends has had, and a mouse cursor (?) what feature do you think will be stripped from the game next to save as many resources as possible and increase revenue? 

My bet is coop vs ai. Intermediate and beginner bots will be removed leaving only intro bots left. That way no resources will have to go into adjusting the item loadouts of the bots when items are changed around competitive play, or a champion gets a rework.

What feature do you think is next to be stripped for revenue?
